verbs.description: [ARG0: Mexico] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: it was slapping a 20 percent tariff on apples and other U.S. agricultural products in direct response to the Trump administration 's steel and aluminum tariffs] .
Mexico announced Tuesday it [V: was] slapping a 20 percent tariff on apples and other U.S. agricultural products in direct response to the Trump administration 's steel and aluminum tariffs .
